response.original_title: Underoath - Define the Great Line - Live at The Observatory
response.overview: Exclusive performance of the Underoath album Define the Great Line in its entirety, performed live from a specially constructed stage called "The Observatory".  1. response.title: Underoath - Define the Great Line - Live at The Observatory
